WonderkidAnswered on 13 May 2019I think Huawei is a good house, being the forerunner in terms of 5G technology and infrastructure, plus the sizeable government and industry deals worldwide.Do take note of the US-China trade tension if you are looking at China-based technology companies dealing with 5G tech.0 comments0
